name: Human Spider
description: The creature was kept onGiedi PrimebyBaronVladimir Harkonnen. It was eating food whenReverend MotherGaius Helen Mohiamarrived to meet with the Baron. She toldPiter de Vriesthat the creature must leave. Piter told her that she could speak without fear, for the creature did not understand their language. She ordered it to get out usingthe Voice, which compelled it to leave the room.
